title: DO-00-003: Summary of Ethical Requirements Applicable to Special Government Employees
summary:
OGE issues a summary of the ethics requirements that are applicable to special Government employees.  

Notes: [Notes: (1) Executive Order 12834, referenced in this DAEOgram, has been revoked. (2) Among other changes to the Standards of Conduct effective August 15, 2024, the restrictions on soliciting from prohibited sources described in .808(c)(1)(i) & (ii) do not apply if “circumstances make clear that the solicitation is motivated by a family relationship or personal friendship that would justify the solicitation.” See 89 FR 43686 and LA-24-06.]
